boat.name: Cadfael
boat.full_description:
'Cadfael' was a bespoke build to a design by Francois Vivier. Launched in 2013, she was fitted out to a higher than usual standard by her builder, Adrian Donovan. Cadfael' is rigged with a single lug sail by James Lawrence.

She was featured in WaterCraft No 104, as well as both Adrian and Francois’ own sites.

Visit her builder, Adrian Donovan's website for more details.
boat.construction_details: glued clinker, ply with mahogany sheerstrake and fit out. Spruce spars.
boat.short_description: Built by Adrian Donovan to a design by Francois Vivier, 'Cadfael' is a Morbic 12.

for_sales.sales_text:
A lovely and much admired Morbic 12, built by Adrian Donovan to a Francois Vivier design. "Cadfael" is rigged with a single lug sail by James Lawrence, has a bespoke combi trailer, a cover and is in near perfect condition.

She was featured in WaterCraft No 104, as well as both Adrian and Francois’ own sites.

She is only for sale because the blasted arthritis means I need a lighter boat.

Lying near Framlingham, Suffolk.
